body.name: Vaseline Intensive Care Body Lotion for Dry Skin Almond Smooth Lotion Made with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, Almond Oil & Vitamin E for a Smooth, Natural Glow 20.3 oz 4 Count

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 11 mins
features: FOR A SMOOTH, NATURAL GLOW: Vaseline Intensive Care Almond Smooth Lotion locks in moisture and deeply nourishes for a smooth, natural glow
FORMULATED WITH ULTRA-HYDRATING LIPIDS: This body lotion for dry skin is formulated with Almond Oil, Vitamin E and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin)
NON-GREASY FEEL: This fast-acting lotion for dry skin absorbs quickly to leave your skin hydrated without feeling greasy
DAILY SKIN CARE: Use Vaseline Intensive Care Almond Smooth Body Lotion as your daily lotion for dry, rough skin. Just apply to your skin for long-lasting hydration and noticeably healthier skin
EQUITABLE SKIN CARE FOR ALL: Skin health is essential for well-being. We’re helping those underserved gets better care for their skin
body.description: Made with Almond Oil, Vitamin E, and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, Vaseline Intensive Care Almond Smooth Lotion helps keep your skin looking healthy and hydrated. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity, and sun), skin’s natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing water to escape the skin. But the Ultra-Hydrating Lipids in our Almond Smooth lotion fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to allow the skin’s natural barrier to recover. Vaseline Intensive Care Almond Smooth Lotion, formulated with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, Almond Oil, and Vitamin E, locks in moisture and promotes smooth, naturally glowing skin. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin). This body lotion for dry skin absorbs fast for rich moisturization without feeling greasy and provides 48-hour moisture. Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthier skin. Just apply to your skin for long-lasting moisture. This lotion bottle is made of 50% recycled plastic. Our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future. Since 2018, we've used 337 Metric Tons of recycled plastic across the Vaseline product portfolio in North America. Our Intensive Care range works to heal dry skin from deep within. Explore the range of Vaseline products, including Vaseline lotion, and enjoy the healing power of Vaseline . Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe, and moisturize all skin. We believe skin health is essential for well-being. That’s why Vaseline is working towards giving everybody, everywhere, access to the skin care they need.

productInformation.name: Active Ingredients
productInformation.value: Water (Eau), Petrolatum, Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Isopropyl Palmitate, Glycol Stearate, Dimethicone, Triethanolamine, Glyceryl Stearate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Edta, Stearamide Amp, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Caramel, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891). manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Intensive Care Almond Smooth Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, Almond Oil, and Vitamin E, locks in moisture and promotes smooth, naturally glowing skin. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin).

ALMOND SMOOTH This body lotion locks in moisture to promote a smooth, natural glow. HYDRATING INGREDIENTS Our formula includes Almond Oil, Vitamin E, and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture. FEEL THE DIFFERENCE This non-greasy body lotion provides 48-hour moisture. A LOTION FOR EVERY SKIN Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe, and moisturize all skin.

Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Soothing Hydration Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Main Benefit Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Body Lotion, with Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, provides long-lasting hydration for nourished, healthy-looking skin. Vaseline Intensive Care Soothing Hydration Body Lotion, with 1% Pure Aloe Vera Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, moisturizes and refreshes dry and dehydrated skin. Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Body Lotion with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Vaseline Jelly, moisturizes and repairs extremely dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is an excellent choice for everyday application. Not greasy, no too thick, very mild smell. Very hydrating to seal in moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful, pleasant scent, non greasy, affordable.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect lotion for daily use. Awesome scent. My husband notes how good my skin feels, which is all I need. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The PERFECT lotion
reviews.reviewText: I'm a bit of a lotion snob.. LolThe scent is rich but subtle and keeps my skin moisturized all day. By far one of my favorite lotions now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good lotion, not for super dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I normally like Vaseline but this particular lotion did not work on my dry winter skin. It might be good for summer use. I put this lotion on in the morning and by lunch I was ashy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably my favorite lotion
reviews.reviewText: Simple. Doesn't leave residue. Absorbs fast...Good stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite body lotion.
reviews.reviewText: It has a scent I can appreciate. It makes my skin feel very smooth and moisturized without oiliness. I ordered it from Amazon because my local pharmacy can't seem to keep it in stock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have to say, this is a moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: My girl loves when I use it on my bag. It is always soft and smooth. The smell is amazing, better than cocoa butter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion makes your skin super soft and it has light scent. This best Vaseline lotion ever.
